Title: Faked My Own Death
Plot: When Earl meets a tough biker chick at a Halloween party, it looks like a match made in heaven--but when the costumes come off, the mismatch becomes apparent and Earl takes drastic measures to get out of the relationship.  Now, years later, Earl must find a way to make amends for deceiving the girl.
GuestStars: Montel Williams,  Darcie Shean,  Dax Shepard,  Beth Riesgraf,  Frances Callier
